text: Pseudoneoponera rufipes is a species of ant of the subfamily Ponerinae. It is found in southern and eastern Asia. ==Subspecies== *Pseudoneoponera rufipes ceylonensis (Jerdon, 1851) \- Sri Lanka *Pseudoneoponera rufipes rufipes Forel, 1911 \- India, Nepal, Thailand, Vietnam, China ==References== ==External links== * * at antwiki.org *Animaldiversity.org Category:Ponerinae Category:Hymenoptera of Asia Category:Insects described in 1851
title: Pseudoneoponera rufipes
